name: unbuttered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unbuttered food, such as bread, has no butter on it: Place a slice of cheese on the unbuttered side of the bread. Unbuttered or slightly buttered popcorn is low in calories.
More examplesFewer examplesWe had a simple picnic of smoked salmon and unbuttered bread.Breakfast is something healthy like a slice of unbuttered toast with a free-range egg on top.She had nothing for herself but a glass of water and a plain unbuttered roll.Spread the mustard on the unbuttered half of the sandwich.
